articles.author: Barbara Starr and Jeremy Herb, CNN
articles.title: US places up to 8,500 troops on alert for possible deployment to Eastern Europe amid Russia tensions - CNN
articles.description: As many as 8,500 US troops have been put on heightened alert for a possible deployment to Eastern Europe as Russian troops mass on Ukraine's border, Pentagon spokesman John Kirby said Monday.
articles.content:

articles.title: "Everything Is Frozen": Snow Storm Shuts Down Europe's Busiest Airport - NDTV
articles.description: Europe's busiest airport shut down in Istanbul on Monday while schools and vaccination centres closed in Athens as a rare snowstorm blanketed swathes of the eastern Mediterranean, causing blackouts and traffic havoc.
